[_JJ NLS_NNP note_NN :_: a_DT graphic_JJ appears_VBZ here_RB -_: see_VBP image_NN of_IN page_NN ]_JJ Bombay_NNP :_: PRINTED_NN AT_IN THE_DT GOVERNMENT_NNP CENTRAL_NNP PRESS_NNP ._.
1874_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
2085_CD OF_IN 1874_CD ._.
FROM_IN THE_NNP SURGEON_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, INDIAN_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP ,_, 9th_CD July_NNP 1874_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1873-74_JJ ,_, in_IN which_WDT there_EX are_VBP many_JJ points_NNS of_IN interest_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN was_VBD 652,223_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 63,866_CD over_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ;_: the_DT most_RBS marked_JJ increase_NN being_VBG in_IN the_DT itinerant_JJ establishment_NN ,_, which_WDT accounts_VBZ for_IN 61,684_CD of_IN the_DT total_JJ increase_NN ._.
The_DT dispensaries_NNS show_VBP an_DT increase_NN of_IN 1,358_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT army_NN of_IN 824_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
This_DT large_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS vaccinated_VBN and_CC re-vacci-_JJ nated_JJ shows_NNS probably_RB not_RB only_RB greater_JJR exertion_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, but_CC also_RB increased_VBD apprecia-_JJ tion_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, evidenced_VBN by_IN greater_JJR willingness_NN on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN to_TO submit_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO the_DT operation_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT largest_JJS factor_NN is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB the_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS and_CC the_DT constant_JJ supervision_NN over_IN them_PRP exercised_VBN by_IN the_DT Assis-_NNP tant_NN Superintendents_NNS ._.
This_DT has_VBZ resulted_VBN from_IN the_DT reorganiza-_JJ tion_NN of_IN 1871_CD ._.
4_CD ._.
Where_WRB progress_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN so_RB great_JJ ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP attributes_VBZ the_DT want_NN to_TO the_DT vaccinators_NNS being_VBG too_RB few_JJ in_IN number_NN for_IN the_DT population_NN and_CC area_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ gratifying_VBG to_TO know_VB that_DT among_IN so_RB many_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, in_IN ._.
only_RB one_CD instance_NN was_VBD a_DT register_NN found_VBD incorrect_NN ;_: and_CC even_RB this_DT may_MD be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO carelessness_VB on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN to_TO an_DT attempt_NN to_TO falsify_VB the_DT record_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP extended_VBD to_TO only_RB 6_CD names_NNS altogether_RB ._.
I_PRP may_MD here_RB add_VB that_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN general_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN actually_RB verified_VBN by_IN Superintendents_NNS comes_VBZ so_RB near_JJ to_TO the_DT numbers_NNS given_VBN by_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS that_IN ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, the_DT latter_NN may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN correct_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT show_VB a_DT good_JJ amount_NN of_IN successful_JJ work_NN done_VBN ._.
a_DT 2_CD 7_CD ._.
The_DT disparity_NN between_IN the_DT sexes_NNS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD formerly_RB so_RB great_JJ ,_, has_VBZ ,_, by_IN more_JJR careful_JJ registration_NN ,_, been_VBN reduced_VBN ;_: and_CC last_JJ year_NN the_DT males_NNS were_VBD 52.8_CD to_TO 47.2_CD females_NNS in_IN each_DT 100_CD ,_, being_VBG a_DT difference_NN of_IN 5.6_CD ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN 1866_CD this_DT amounted_VBD to_TO 10_CD ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT percentages_NNS of_IN caste_NN are_VBP much_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN for_IN several_JJ years_NNS back_RB ._.
9_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN infantile_JJ vaccina-_JJ tions_NNS of_IN 37,059_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ more_JJR than_IN half_PDT the_DT total_JJ increase_NN ;_: the_DT percentage_NN of_IN children_NNS under_IN one_CD year_NN in_IN the_DT total_NN vaccinated_VBD is_VBZ 38_CD ,_, or_CC 1.2_CD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN probably_RB 41_CD or_CC 42_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS is_VBZ about_IN the_DT highest_JJS that_WDT can_MD be_VB reached_VBN by_IN an_DT itinerant_JJ establishment_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN ours_NNS is_VBZ ._.
In_IN this_DT view_NN I_PRP concur_VBP ._.
But_CC where_WRB large_JJ populations_NNS are_VBP stationary_JJ ,_, as_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP City_NNP ,_, a_DT much_RB higher_JJR ratio_NN can_MD be_VB obtained3_JJ proves_NNS ._.
Last_JJ year_NN the_DT lymph_NN supplied_VBD from_IN England_NNP was_VBD not_RB so_RB successful_JJ as_IN usual_JJ and_CC no_DT reason_NN can_MD be_VB given_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP might_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO communicate_VB the_DT source_NN of_IN each_DT supply_NN sent_VBD out_RP ._.
12_CD ._.
Animal_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ still_RB carried_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ very_RB much_JJ esteemed_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ;_: and_CC though_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB high_JJ as_IN when_WRB human_JJ lymph_NN is_VBZ used_VBN ,_, still_RB it_PRP must_MD always_RB be_VB viewed_VBN as_IN a_DT valuable_JJ adjunct_NN ;_: as_IN here_RB ,_, few_JJ persons_NNS allow_VBP lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vesicles_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, and_CC some_DT parents_NNS prefer_VBP the_DT animal_NN to_TO human_JJ lymph_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
Although_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT total_JJ expendi-_JJ ture_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ,_, the_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN less_VBN by_IN 6_CD pies_NNS than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ in_IN all_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN districts_NNS ,_, except_IN Belgaum_NNP and_CC Dharwad_NNP ._.
A_DT further_JJ extension_NN would_MD follow_VB an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS there_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP wishes_VBZ the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Collectors_NNPS called_VBD to_TO the_DT advisability_NN of_IN having_VBG more_JJR than_IN one_CD taluka_NN vaccinator_NN where_WRB the_DT population_NN exceeds_VBZ 100,000_CD ._.
In_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, the_DT pro-_JJ gress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ,_, and_CC promises_VBZ further_JJ improvement_NN ._.
Although_IN vaccination_NN at_IN dispensaries_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB all_DT that_WDT can_MD be_VB desired_VBN ,_, still_RB some_DT progress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN and_CC more_RBR will_MD gradually_RB follow_VB ._.
I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_DT several_JJ of_IN the_DT officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN dispensaries_NNS have_VBP been_VBN favourably_RB noticed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP ,_, espe-_JJ cially_RB Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Mackenzie_NNP and_CC Honorary_NNP Surgeon_NNP Sinclair_NNP ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP views_NNS with_IN anxiety_NN and_CC fore-_JJ boding_NN of_IN ill_NN the_DT falling_VBG off_RP in_IN the_DT numbers_NNS vaccinated_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN this_DT can_MD be_VB met_VBN only_RB by_IN a_DT compulsory_JJ Vacci-_NNP nation_NN Act_NNP ._.
Certainly_RB the_DT results_NNS are_VBP altogether_RB disproportionate_JJ to_TO the_DT cost_NN ._.
The_DT reason_NN of_IN this_DT is_VBZ evidently_RB due_JJ chiefly_NN to_TO there_EX being_VBG a_DT Superintendent_NN to_TO so_RB small_JJ a_DT circle_NN as_IN Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP is_VBZ ,_, his_PRP$ pay_NN alone_RB adding_VBG about_IN 7_CD annas_NNS to_TO the_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN ._.
Speaking_VBG generally_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ for_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN in_IN a_DT city_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB as_RB many_JJ as_IN he_PRP can_MD do_VB in_IN a_DT rural_JJ district_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS inoculation_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP notices_VBZ that_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN practised_VBN in_IN the_DT Wái_NNP Táluká_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO say_VB to_TO what_WP extent_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ there_RB could_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, very_RB little_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._.
17_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP thinks_VBZ no_DT reliance_NN can_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT record_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN for_IN statistical_JJ purposes_NNS ._.
18_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP estimates_VBZ the_DT population_NN at_IN 24½_CD millions_NNS ,_, which_WDT includes_VBZ the_DT civil_JJ population_NN of_IN Mhow_NNP ,_, Nimach_NNP ,_, and_CC Nasirabad_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP thinks_VBZ there_EX are_VBP at_IN least_JJS 735,000_CD births_NNS per_IN annum_NN ._.
After_IN writing_VBG off_RP 1/13th_CD of_IN the_DT births_NNS for_IN deaths_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, he_PRP considers_VBZ the_DT depart-_JJ 4_CD ment_NN might_MD vaccinate_VB 678,462_CD children_NNS primarily_RB ,_, or_CC probably_RB even_RB more_RBR ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT annual_JJ increment_NN of_IN population_NN ._.
He_PRP takes_VBZ the_DT birth-rate_NN at_IN 30_CD per_IN mille_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT low_JJ rate_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT basis_NN 9/10_CD ths_NNS of_IN the_DT available_JJ children_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN last_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ result_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT re-organiza-_JJ tion_NN of_IN 1871_CD ._.
19_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN each_DT vac-_JJ cinator_NN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ Presidency_NNP is_VBZ 1,652_CD ,_, or_CC 146_CD more_JJR than_IN the_DT pre-_JJ ceding_NN year_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD highest_JJS in_IN Sindh_NNP and_CC lowest_JJS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP and_CC Southern_NNP Circles_NNP ._.
20_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ 4_CD or_CC 5_CD years_NNS ,_, in_IN at_IN least_JJS a_DT million_CD of_IN observa-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, there_EX has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN a_DT single_JJ instance_NN brought_VBD to_TO light_NN of_IN syphilis_NN having_VBG been_VBN communicated_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ;_: nor_CC has_VBZ ever_RB any_DT such_JJ occurrence_NN been_VBN known_VBN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
21_CD ._.
The_DT suggestion_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccina-_NNP tion_NN ,_, that_DT Government_NNP might_MD avail_VB itself_PRP of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP in_IN the_DT general_JJ sanitation_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB made_VBN of_IN great_JJ value_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD rather_RB agree_VB with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP in_IN maintaining_VBG the_DT present_JJ number_NN of_IN Superintendents_NNS and_CC allowing_VBG them_PRP to_TO be_VB Sanitary_JJ Officers_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ districts_NNS ,_, believing_VBG as_IN I_PRP do_VBP they_PRP must_MD thus_RB become_VB a_DT power_NN for_IN great_JJ good_JJ in_IN the_DT furtherance_NN of_IN this_DT cause_NN so_RB greatly_RB to_TO be_VB desir-_JJ ed_NN ._.
These_DT officers_NNS ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ assistants_NNS ,_, so_RB constantly_RB moving_VBG about_RB in_IN the_DT districts_NNS and_CC visiting_VBG thousands_NNS of_IN villages_NNS ,_, might_MD certainly_RB be_VB ,_, as_IN the_DT Army_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commission_NNP suggested_VBD ,_, made_VBD useful_JJ for_IN effi-_JJ rient_NN inspecting_VBG service_NN in_IN helping_VBG towards_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN local_JJ di-_JJ sease_NN causes_NNS ._.
The_DT Bombay_NNP Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP partakes_VBZ very_RB much_JJ indeed_RB of_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN what_WP might_MD be_VB a_DT most_RBS efficient_JJ sani-_JJ tary_JJ service_NN for_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ;_: and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP that_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP and_CC Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP working_VBG together_RB might_MD ,_, in_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ,_, collect_VBP a_DT fund_NN of_IN useful_JJ information_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD go_VB far_RB towards_RB enabling_VBG this_DT Government_NN to_TO take_VB active_JJ sanitary_JJ steps_NNS when_WRB they_PRP may_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.
22_CD ._.
Government_NNP will_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO know_VB that_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Super-_NNP intendents_NNS have_VBP &_CC quot_VBP ;_: completely_RB realized_VBD the_DT expectations_NNS formed_VBN of_IN them_PRP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC may_MD be_VB disposed_VBN to_TO extend_VB their_PRP$ usefulness_NN in_IN the_DT mat-_JJ ter_NN of_IN sanitation_NN so_RB strongly_RB advocated_VBN by_IN the_DT Army_NNP Sanitary_NNP Com-_NNP mission_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP reports_VBZ this_DT might_MD be_VB done_VBN without_IN injuring_VBG their_PRP$ efficiency_NN in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ branch_NN ,_, or_CC adding_VBG much_JJ ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, to_TO the_DT expenditure_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
A_DT new_JJ feature_NN in_IN this_DT report_NN is_VBZ the_DT carefully_RB prepared_JJ details_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN each_DT zilha_NN ,_, which_WDT give_VBP the_DT important_JJ points_NNS of_IN the_DT tabulated_JJ statements_NNS ,_, and_CC enables_VBZ the_DT general_JJ reader_NN easily_RB to_TO apprehend_VB the_DT state_NN and_CC condition_NN of_IN vac-_JJ 5_CD cination_NN in_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
These_DT details_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT progress_NN varies_VBZ very_RB much_JJ in_IN different_JJ districts_NNS and_CC circles_NNS ._.
Thus_RB in_IN Sindh_NNP 42.1_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN population_NN were_VBD primarily_RB vaccinat-_JJ ed_NNS ,_, while_IN only_RB 13.4_CD in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC 17.2_CD in_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, were_VBD protected_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
24_CD ._.
Considering_VBG the_DT amount_NN and_CC the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN shown_VBN in_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, I_PRP most_JJS cordially_RB endorse_VBP the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP regarding_VBG how_WRB much_RB more_JJR it_PRP says_VBZ in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT organization_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT energy_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ assistants_NNS and_CC vaccinators_NNS ,_, than_IN words_NNS can_MD do_VB :_: and_CC I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO add_VB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP entirely_RB satisfied_VBN with_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO commend_VB the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP and_CC Doctors_NNP Williams_NNP ._.
Butler_NNP ,_, Cody_NNP and_CC Cola_NNP to_TO the_DT favourable_JJ notice_NN of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NN ,_, (_( Signed_VBN )_) W._NNP THOM_NNP ,_, Surgeon_NNP General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP THROUGHOUT_NNP THE_NNP BOMBAY_NNP PRESIDENCY_NNP AND_NNP SINDH_NNP FOR_NNP THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1873-74_CD ._.
Divisions_NNS of_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT sixth_JJ report_NN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN the_DT usual_JJ parts_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 1st_CD the_DT general_JJ report_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT summary_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ department_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN it_PRP the_DT chief_JJ points_NNS of_IN the_DT circle_NN superintendents_NNS '_POS reports_NNS are_VBP noticed_VBN ;_: 2nd_CD ,_, extracts_NNS from_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN superintendents_NNS ,_, civil_JJ surgeons_NNS and_CC dispensary_JJ officers_NNS and_CC also_RB several_JJ special_JJ reports_NNS on_IN revaccination_NN ;_: and_CC 3rd_CD ,_, the_DT tables_NNS of_IN returns_NNS showing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS in_IN each_DT circle_NN ;_: the_DT cost_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN each_DT circle_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT whole_JJ department_NN :_: the_DT vaccinations_NNS at_IN dispensaries_NNS ,_, jails_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT army_NN :_: also_RB the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinated_JJ children_NNS inspected_VBN by_IN superintendents_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ assistants_NNS and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ deaths_NNS in_IN each_DT registration_NN circle_NN ._.
Alterations_NNS in_IN the_DT vaccine_NN circles_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Before_IN proceeding_VBG to_TO show_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB well_RB to_TO notice_VB the_DT changes_NNS which_WDT have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT circles_NNS since_IN last_JJ report_NN was_VBD submitted_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT reorganization_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN which_WDT was_VBD made_VBN in_IN 1871_CD there_EX was_VBD a_DT saving_NN of_IN some_DT ten_NNS thousand_VBP rupees_NNS ,_, which_WDT Government_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ Resolution_NN No_DT ._.
1202_CD dated_VBD 3rd_CD April_NNP 1873_CD ordered_VBD to_TO be_VB expended_VBN in_IN improving_VBG the_DT department_NN ,_, because_IN they_PRP had_VBD pledged_VBN themselves_PRP not_RB to_TO effect_NN a_DT saving_NN of_IN provincial_JJ money_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN local_JJ funds_NNS ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP when_WRB acting_VBG Superin-_NNP tendent_NN General_NNP ,_, drew_VBD up_RP a_DT scheme_NN which_WDT was_VBD submitted_VBN to_TO Government_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
378_CD dated_JJ 3rd_CD June_NNP 1873_CD and_CC finally_RB approved_VBN by_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
2783_CD dated_VBD 7th_CD August_NNP 1873_CD ,_, and_CC brought_VBD into_IN effect_NN from_IN the_DT following_JJ November_NNP ._.
The_DT changes_NNS may_MD briefly_VB be_VB expressed_VBN thus_RB :_: (_( ii_NN )_) and_CC added_VBN to_TO the_DT Central_NNP circle_NN ;_: and_CC 5th_CD ,_, Sáwantwadi_NNP state_NN was_VBD taken_VBN from_IN the_DT Western_JJ circle_NN and_CC thrown_VB into_IN the_DT Southern_JJ circle_NN ;_: 6th_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD recom-_JJ mended_VBD that_IN ,_, after_IN Dr._NNP Butler_NNP vacates_VBZ his_PRP$ dual_JJ appointment_NN of_IN civil_JJ surgeon_NN of_IN Rájkot_NNP and_CC superintendent_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Western_JJ Gujaráth_NNP circle_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD appointments_NNS should_MD be_VB separated_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX should_MD be_VB a_DT superintendent_NN for_IN the_DT Western_JJ Gujaráth_NNP circle_NN ,_, who_WP shall_MD have_VB no_DT other_JJ than_IN vaccine_JJ duties_NNS to_TO perform_VB (_( iii_NN )_) Number_NNP ._.

15_CD ._.

Population_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
In_IN 1871_CD I_PRP estimated_VBD the_DT population_NN of_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP with_IN its_PRP$ subordinate_JJ native_JJ states_NNS at_IN 21,000,000_CD :_: but_CC the_DT census_NN which_WDT was_VBD taken_VBN in_IN 1871_CD shows_NNS that_IN my_PRP$ estimate_NN was_VBD considerably_RB under_IN the_DT real_JJ number_NN ._.

Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
I._NN shows_VBZ a_DT population_NN of_IN 24,362,409_CD to_TO which_WDT must_MD be_VB added_VBN about_IN 123,220_CD for_IN the_DT military_JJ stations_NNS :_: this_DT makes_VBZ a_DT total_NN of_IN 24,485,629_CD ,_, and_CC if_IN we_PRP add_VBP the_DT civil_JJ population_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ stations_NNS of_IN Mhow_NNP ,_, Nímach_NNP and_CC Nasirábád_NNP ,_, from_IN which_WDT we_PRP receive_VBP vaccination_NN returns_NNS ,_, the_DT population_NN in_IN which_WDT we_PRP carry_VBP on_IN vaccination_NN ,_, must_MD be_VB in_IN round_JJ numbers_NNS about_IN 24,500,000_CD ._.

17_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT British_JJ territory_NN of_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP there_EX are_VBP now_RB birth_JJ and_CC death_NN registers_NNS kept_VBN by_IN village_NN officers_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ perfectly_RB certain_JJ that_IN the_DT registrars_NNS do_VBP not_RB register_VB anything_NN like_IN all_PDT the_DT births_NNS ._.
Hitherto_NNP I_PRP have_VBP usually_RB reckoned_VBN the_DT birth-rate_NN at_IN 30_CD per_IN mille_NN but_CC I_PRP feel_VBP very_RB great_JJ doubt_NN about_IN this_DT being_VBG high_JJ enough_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ only_RB one_CD country_NN in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, France_NNP ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ a_DT lower_JJR birth-rate_NN than_IN 30_CD per_IN mille_NN ._.

the_DT lower_JJR number_NN of_IN 30_CD per_IN mille_NN there_EX should_MD be_VB in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 24,500,000_CD about_IN 735,000_CD births_NNS per_IN annum_NN and_CC if_IN a_DT thirteenth_NN be_VB deducted_VBN for_IN still-born_JJ and_CC those_DT who_WP die_VBP and_CC get_VBP small-pox_JJ before_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN can_MD reach_VB them_PRP ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB 678,462_CD available_JJ for_IN vaccination_NN annually_RB or_CC only_RB 52,544_CD more_JJR than_IN were_VBD primarily_RB vaccina-_JJ ted_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ;_: so_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB observed_VBN that_IN the_DT annual_JJ increase_NN in_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS can_MD not_RB go_VB on_IN at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ,_, but_CC a_DT steady_JJ increase_NN of_IN revaccinations_NNS may_MD be_VB reasonably_RB expected_VBN :_: and_CC doubtless_VB the_DT annual_JJ increment_NN to_TO popula-_JJ tion_NN will_MD give_VB a_DT corresponding_JJ increase_NN of_IN births_NNS and_CC consequently_RB of_IN vaccina-_JJ tions_NNS ._.

Revaccination_NN ._.
21_CD ._.

4th_CD ._.

I_PRP would_MD observe_VB here_RB that_IN the_DT army_JJ percentage_NN of_IN success_NN is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT more_RBR correct_JJ ._.

the_DT Ráo_NNP of_IN Kutch_NNP 's_POS medical_JJ officer_NN ._.

Vaccino-Syphilis_NNP ._.
44_CD ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB very_RB generally_RB admitted_VBN that_IN the_DT virus_NN of_IN syphilis_NN may_MD be_VB communicated_VBN to_TO a_DT person_NN along_IN with_IN the_DT vaccine_NN virus_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP can_MD only_RB be_VB so_RB by_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN being_VBG so_RB careless_RB as_IN to_TO imply_VB an_DT utter_JJ neglect_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS ordinary_JJ observation_NN and_CC caution_NN ._.
The_DT com-_JJ munication_NN of_IN syphilis_NN by_IN vaccination_NN must_MD be_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT very_RB rarest_JJ occurrences_NNS in_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC the_DT testimony_NN of_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Bom-_NNP bay_NN Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP alone_RB proves_VBZ this_DT to_TO be_VB the_DT case_NN ._.
Not_RB one_CD of_IN us_PRP has_VBZ ever_RB seen_VBN such_PDT a_DT case_NN and_CC only_RB one_CD case_NN has_VBZ ever_RB been_VBN even_RB spoken_JJR of_IN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP 's_POS enquiries_NNS proved_VBD conclusively_RB that_IN vaccination_NN had_VBD nothing_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN the_DT syphilis_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN inspected_VBD 92,976_CD vaccinated_JJ children_NNS and_CC the_DT worst_JJS things_NNS they_PRP saw_VBD were_VBD neglected_VBN sores_NNS and_CC an_DT abscess_NN or_CC two_CD (_( xxv_NN )_) intendent_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP much_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN reporting_VBG that_IN Surgeon_NNP Raby_NNP passed_VBD in_IN Maráthí_NNP on_IN 21st_CD November_NNP last_JJ and_CC Surgeon_NNP Major_NNP Turnbull_NNP in_IN March_NNP last_JJ ;_: Surgeon_NNP Williams_NNP ,_, superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT Sindh_NNP circle_NN ,_, passed_VBD the_DT higher_JJR standard_NN in_IN Sindhi_NNP some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ;_: Dr._NNP Colá_NNP in_IN the_DT Estern_NNP Gujaráth_NNP circle_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN required_VBN to_TO pass_VB ,_, as_IN Gujaráthi_NNP is_VBZ his_PRP$ mother_NN tongue_NN (_( Government_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
555_CD dated_VBD 24th_CD February_NNP 1874_CD )_) ;_: Surgeon_NNP Cody_NNP ,_, superinten-_JJ dent_NN of_IN the_DT Western_JJ circle_NN ,_, has_VBZ applied_VBN for_IN a_DT committee_NN to_TO examine_VB him_PRP ._.

of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ ample_JJ to_TO test_VB the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinations_NNS and_CC the_DT truthfulness_NN of_IN the_DT returns_NNS ._.

superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT Central_NNP circle_NN during_IN the_DT rains_NNS and_CC also_RB the_DT practice_NN of_IN animal_JJ vaccination_NN as_IN carried_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT late_JJ Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP .Bálkrishna_NNP Chin-_NNP tobá_NN at_IN the_DT Khan_NNP Bahadur_NNP Pestonjee_NNP Sorabjeo_NNP Dispensary_NNP in_IN Poona_NNP and_CC I_PRP also_RB saw_VBD the_DT Hawelí_NNP táluká_NNP vaccinator_NN 's_POS work_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.

and_CC examined_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ vaccinator_NN there_EX and_CC at_IN Kolset_NNP bandar_NN and_CC also_RB the_DT vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN at_IN the_DT dispensary_NN in_IN Tháná.._NNP On_IN the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP I_PRP started_VBD on_IN the_DT regular_JJ tour_NN ._.

Presidency_NNP circle_NN ._.
53_CD ._.
The_DT Presidency_NNP circle_NN consists_VBZ of_IN Bombay_NNP city_NN ;_: which_WDT has_VBZ a_DT popu-_JJ lation_NN of_IN 644,405_CD and_CC an_DT area_NN of_IN 19_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ._.
For_IN this_DT circle_NN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT superinten-_JJ dent_NN ,_, Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Anantá_NNP Chandrobá_NNP ,_, G.G.M.C._NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD 11_CD vaccinators_NNS and_CC 11_CD peons_NNS under_IN him_PRP ,_, during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX are_VBP now_RB 16_CD and_CC 5_CD respectively_RB ._.
They_PRP primarily_RB vaccinated_VBD 10,027_CD persons_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP 8,665_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, 1,187_CD unsuccesful_JJ and_CC in_IN 446_CD the_DT result_NN was_VBD unknown_JJ ._.
Of_IN the_DT unsuccessful_JJ ,_, only_RB 271_CD were_VBD operated_VBN on_IN a_DT second_JJ time_NN ._.
The_DT success_NN was_VBD thus_RB only_RB 87.9_CD ._.
The_DT cow-lymph_NN was_VBD lost_VBN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN July_NNP and_CC August_NNP and_CC vaccination_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN by_IN lymph_NN in_IN tubes_NNS received_VBN from_IN the_DT other_JJ circles_NNS ._.
The_DT great_JJ number_NN of_IN failures_NNS with_IN this_DT tube-lymph_NN swelled_VBD the_DT unsuccessful_JJ and_CC has_VBZ affected_VBN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD 3,880_CD revaccinated_VBN of_IN whom_WP 69_CD were_VBD operated_VBN on_IN twice_NN ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN was_VBD 53.5_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD 1,264_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN was_VBD 2,508_CD less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preced-_NN ing_VBG year_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Anantá_NNP Chandrobá_NNP attributes_VBZ this_DT decrease_NN chiefly_NN to_TO the_DT great_JJ number_NN of_IN children_NNS protected_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN that_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT exact_JJ number_NN of_IN births_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ probably_RB not_RB known_VBN to_TO any_DT one_CD but_CC I_PRP estimate_VBP it_PRP at_IN 25_CD per_IN mille_NN ._.
Bombay_NNP like_IN all_DT large_JJ cities_NNS has_VBZ a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN non-breeding_JJ men_NNS who_WP have_VBP left_VBN their_PRP$ wives_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ country-_JJ homes_NNS ,_, consequently_RB the_DT birth-rate_NN is_VBZ low_JJ ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN births_NNS is_VBZ proba-_JJ bly_RB about_IN 16,000_CD and_CC we_PRP might_MD primarily_RB vaccinate_VB nearly_RB 15,000_CD children_NNS per_IN annum_NN or_CC just_RB about_IN 5,000_CD more_JJR than_IN were_VBD primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN last_JJ year_NN ._.
I_PRP estimate_VBP that_IN there_EX are_VBP probably_RB 5,000_CD of_IN the_DT children_NNS born_VBN in_IN 1873-74_JJ left_NN unprotected_VBD ._.
With_IN such_PDT an_DT annual_JJ residue_NN ,_, there_EX must_MD inovi-_VB tably_RB be_VB an_DT epidemic_JJ of_IN small-pox_JJ every_DT few_JJ years_NNS ;_: especially_RB as_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ endemic_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC is_VBZ also_RB constantly_RB imported_VBN from_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Africa_NNP and_CC the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ._.
This_DT can_MD not_RB be_VB considered_VBN satisfactory_JJ ;_: and_CC what_WP is_VBZ even_RB worse_JJR ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB promise_VB myself_PRP much_JJ progress_NN without_IN a_DT compulsory_NN vaccination_NN Act_NNP ._.
I_PRP doubt_VBP very_RB much_RB if_IN as_RB large_JJ a_DT proportion_NN of_IN children_NNS could_MD be_VB vaccinated_VBN in_IN London_NNP ,_, Liverpool_NNP or_CC Manchester_NNP without_IN a_DT com-_JJ pulsory_NN Act_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS was_VBD in-_JJ creased_VBN from_IN 11_CD to_TO 16_CD and_CC the_DT peons_NNS diminished_VBD from_IN 11_CD to_TO 5_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT hope_NN that_IN more_JJR operators_NNS will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO cover_VB more_JJR of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB still_RB give_VB further_JJ facilities_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS to_TO obtain_VB vaccination_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ now_RB little_JJ or_CC no_DT trouble_NN given_VBN to_TO parents_NNS ,_, for_IN human-lymph_NN is_VBZ seldom_RB used_VBN and_CC a_DT calf_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN to_TO the_DT very_RB street_NN where_WRB work_NN is_VBZ going_VBG on_IN ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ high_JJ (_( Rs_NNP ._.
1-1-3_JJ )_) as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT other_JJ circles_NNS ;_: but_CC this_DT is_VBZ unavoidable_JJ ,_, even_RB with_IN a_DT compulsory_NN Act_NNP it_PRP will_MD be_VB high_JJ ._.
Since_IN writing_VBG the_DT foregoing_NN lines_NNS Dr._NNP Weir_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Munici-_NNP pality_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB good_JJ as_IN to_TO inform_VB me_PRP that_IN there_EX were_VBD 15,665_CD deaths_NNS and_CC 12,722_CD births_NNS registered_VBN in_IN the_DT calendar_NN year_NN 1873_CD ._.

The_DT Central_NNP circle_NN now_RB consists_VBZ of_IN the_DT collectorates_NNS of_IN Puná_NNP ,_, Ah-_NNP madnagar_NN ,_, Sholápur_NNP ,_, Sátárá_NNP and_CC Ratnágiri_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT native_JJ states_NNS of_IN Akalkot_NNP ,_, Bhor_NNP ,_, Jat_NNP ,_, Atpadi_NNP and_CC Phaltan_NNP ._.

The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN was_VBD ,_, by_IN the_DT rural_JJ vaccinators_NNS 15,079_CD and_CC 1,897_CD at_IN dispensaries_NNS (_( xxix_NN )_) number_NN of_IN persons_NNS primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN was_VBD 29,250_CD or_CC 26.2_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN population_NN ._.

There_EX were_VBD only_RB 98_CD revaccina-_JJ lions_NNS ._.
The_DT progress_NN here_RB is_VBZ very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT reason_NN of_IN Sátárá_NNP zilha_NNP being_VBG so_RB well_RB vaccinated_VBN is_VBZ that_IN ,_, in_IN 1863_CD a_DT number_NN of_IN municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO supplement_VB the_DT weak_JJ staff_NN of_IN Government_NNP vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT Honourable_NNP F._NNP S._NNP Chapman_NNP was_VBD then_RB collector_NN of_IN the_DT zilha_NN and_CC Mr._NNP Plumptre_NNP was_VBD the_DT superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT Southern_NNP circle_NN ._.
That_DT was_VBD the_DT first_JJ step_NN taken_VBN to_TO have_VB municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS and_CC the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN these_DT two_CD officers_NNS has_VBZ borne_VBN good_JJ fruit_NN :_: but_CC after_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT local_JJ fund_NN vaccinator_NN to_TO each_DT taluka_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN unnecessary_JJ to_TO keep_VB up_RP as_RB many_JJ municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS as_IN at_IN first_JJ ._.

4_CD (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) dated_VBD India_NNP Office_NNP ,_, London_NNP ,_, 26th_CD March_NNP 1872_CD ._.

8_CD to_TO the_DT Western_JJ circle_NN and_CC the_DT collectorate_NN of_IN Ratnágirí_NNP from_IN the_DT Western_JJ to_TO the_DT Central_NNP circle_NN ._.

9_CD ._.

over_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.

The_DT same_JJ way_NN with_IN Sholápur_NNP ._.
Of_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 53,403_CD nearly_RB 15,000_CD are_VBP lingayat_JJ wanis_NN ,_, a_DT people_NNS whose_WP$ principal_JJ objection_NN to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP can_MD ascertain_VB ,_, is_VBZ caused_VBN by_IN the_DT dread_NN of_IN having_VBG to_TO allow_VB lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT arms_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS ._.

11_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Mahálungi_NNP in_IN the_DT Khed_NNP táluká_NN ,_, Pooná_NNP collectorate_NN ,_, a_DT patil_NN reported_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ child_NN had_VBD not_RB only_RB been_VBN vaccinated_VBN by_IN force_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD very_RB ill_JJ in_IN consequence_NN ._.
Enquiry_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB made_VBN ._.
Mr._NNP Trimbak_NNP Anant_NNP ,_, the_DT assistant_NN superintendent_NN ,_, proceeded_VBD to_TO the_DT spot_NN and_CC with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN a_DT panchayat_NN investigated_VBD the_DT case_NN and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT report_NN was_VBD a_DT tissue_NN of_IN misstatements_NNS ._.

Small-pox_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
Though_IN during_IN the_DT past_JJ four_CD months_NNS I_PRP have_VBP tested_VBN the_DT work_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS 30_CD vaccinators_NNS and_CC called_VBN over_RP the_DT names_NNS of_IN nearly_RB 5,000_CD children_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP stood_VBD on_IN the_DT register_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP failed_VBN to_TO discover_VB a_DT single_JJ death_NN of_IN a_DT child_NN from_IN small-pox_JJ after_IN successful_JJ vaccina-_JJ tion_NN ._.

Tour_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP 1873_CD the_DT office_NN was_VBD in_IN Khándesh_NNP and_CC thence_NN Dr._NNP Robb_NNP proceeded_VBD through_IN the_DT Násik_NNP district_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ month_NN ._.
In_IN October_NNP I_PRP examined_VBD a_DT few_JJ villages_NNS in_IN Haweli_NNP táluká_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT 3rd_CD November_NNP proceeded_VBD through_IN Haweli_NNP and_CC Sirur_NNP tálukás_NN to_TO the_DT Ahmadnágar_NNP district_NN in_IN company_NN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP ._.
Work_NN of_IN the_DT Haweli_NNP vaccinator_NN excellent_NN ,_, that_IN of_IN the_DT Sirur_NNP vaccinator_NN the_DT very_RB reverse_NN ._.

In_IN Párner_NNP the_DT work_NN was_VBD good_JJ but_CC very_RB small_JJ in_IN amount_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN villages_NNS remained_VBN unvisited_JJ and_CC the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD and_CC had_VBD been_VBN conducting_VBG himself_PRP very_RB irregularly_RB ,_, I_PRP asked_VBD the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP to_TO remove_VB him_PRP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD done_VBN and_CC the_DT municipal_JJ vaccinator_NN of_IN Ahmadnagar_NNP appointed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ place_NN ._.
At_IN Nagar_NNP we_PRP inspected_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT táluká_NN and_CC municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS and_CC found_VBD it_PRP very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
From_IN Nagar_NNP we_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT Newasa_NNP taluka_NN and_CC thence_NN to_TO the_DT Siogaon_NNP taluka_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT latter_JJ vaccination_NN was_VBD not_RB pro-_JJ gressing_VBG satisfactorily_RB and_CC as_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN wished_VBD to_TO resign_VB his_PRP$ appointment_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD discharged_VBN ._.
In_IN Newásá_NNP Vithu_NNP Bhikáji_NNP was_VBD doing_VBG very_RB fair_JJ work_NN but_CC not_RB going_VBG over_IN his_PRP$ district_NN so_RB regularly_RB as_IN is_VBZ desirable_JJ ._.
This_DT fault_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT very_RB rare_JJ one_CD and_CC the_DT wonder_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB more_RBR frequent_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT men_NNS are_VBP without_IN maps_NNS ._.
Every_DT vaccinator_NN should_MD be_VB supplied_VBN with_IN a_DT map_NN of_IN his_PRP$ district_NN ._.
Without_IN them_PRP they_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO go_VB over_IN the_DT villages_NNS regularly_RB ._.
From_IN Newásá_NNP I_PRP proceeded_VBD through_IN the_DT tálukás_NN of_IN Rahuri_NNP ,_, Kopargaon_NNP and_CC Sangamner_NNP ._.
In_IN Rahuri_NNP everything_NN was_VBD satisfactory_JJ ._.
When_WRB in_IN this_DT táluká_NN I_PRP tested_VBD lymph_JJ re-_JJ ceived_VBN from_IN England_NNP through_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
It_PRP resulted_VBD successfully_RB and_CC was_VBD propagated_VBN and_CC distributed_VBN in_IN tubes_NNS throughout_IN the_DT circle_NN and_CC to_TO several_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS beyond_IN the_DT circle_NN limits_NNS ._.
In_IN Kopargaon_NNP taluka_NN matters_NNS were_VBD not_RB so_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT fault_NN was_VBD not_RB entirely_RB the_DT vaccinator_NN 's_POS ._.
In_IN many_JJ villages_NNS the_DT village_NN officers_NNS (_( I_PRP know_VBP from_IN personal_JJ experience_NN )_) give_NN less_JJR assistance_NN than_IN elsewhere_RB ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD middling_VBG and_CC his_PRP$ lymph_NN inferior_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD at_IN once_RB ordered_VBN to_TO discontinue_VB the_DT latter_NN and_CC was_VBD sup-_JJ plied_JJ afresh_NN from_IN the_DT Rahuri_NNP táluká_NN ._.
In_IN Sangamner_NNP táluká_VBD the_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD actively_RB and_CC successfully_RB pursuing_VBG his_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, but_CC had_VBD difficulties_NNS to_TO contend_VB with_IN 13_CD pensaries_NNS and_CC report_VB the_DT result_NN for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT superintendent_NN ._.
The_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP has_VBZ since_IN issued_VBN instructions_NNS on_IN this_DT point_NN ._.
From_IN Sangamner_NNP I_PRP proceeded_VBD to_TO Narayangaon_NNP in_IN the_DT Juner_NNP táluká_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ always_RB been_VBN the_DT worst_JJS vaccinated_JJ district_NN in_IN this_DT circle_NN notwithstanding_VBG the_DT waste_NN of_IN much_JJ valuable_JJ time_NN in_IN almost_RB vain_NN endeavours_NNS to_TO overcome_VB the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Juner_NNP táluká_NN I_PRP visited_VBD 16_CD villages_NNS and_CC personally_RB explained_VBD the_DT objects_NNS and_CC benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN to_TO the_DT village_NN officers_NNS and_CC people_NNS ._.
I_PRP also_RB visited_VBD and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT town_NN and_CC dispensary_NN of_IN Juner_NNP ._.
Vaccination_NN had_VBD been_VBN well_RB kept_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT native_JJ doctor_NN in_IN charge_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Babaji_NNP Jadhao_NNP ._.
From_IN Juner_NNP I_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT Khed_NNP táluká_NN inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ fund_NN and_CC municipal_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT former_JJ was_VBD well_RB done_VBN but_CC the_DT latter_NN was_VBD only_RB fairly_RB so_RB ._.
However_RB he_PRP has_VBZ many_JJ difficulties_NNS to_TO contend_VB with_IN ,_, specially_RB in_IN the_DT towns_NNS of_IN Khed_NNP and_CC Penth_NNP ._.
From_IN Khed_NNP I_PRP went_VBD to_TO Madhe_NNP and_CC Karmala_NNP tálukás_NN where_WRB [_NN found_VBD the_DT work_NN moderately_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
Thence_NN I_PRP went_VBD to_TO Bársi_NNP ,_, examined_VBD the_DT dispensary_NN ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ vaccinator_NN and_CC had_VBD an_DT interview_NN with_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ committee_NN to_TO consider_VB the_DT best_JJS means_NNS of_IN promoting_VBG vaccination_NN among_IN certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP have_VBP hitherto_VBN not_RB accepted_VBN its_PRP$ benefits_NNS ._.
The_DT lingáyat_NN wanis_NN ,_, of_IN whom_WP there_EX are_VBP 8,000_CD in_IN Barsi_NNP ,_, are_VBP very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO manage_VB ._.
They_PRP object_VBP to_TO vaccination_NN but_CC more_RBR especially_RB to_TO allowing_VBG lymph_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vaccinated_JJ child_NN 's_POS arm_NN ._.
One_CD member_NN of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ committee_NN him-_JJ self_NN a_DT lingayat_JJ wani_NN informed_VBD me_PRP that_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT principal_JJ objection_NN his_PRP$ fellow-_JJ casteman_NN had_VBD to_TO the_DT operation_NN ;_: that_IN he_PRP thought_VBD they_PRP had_VBD no_DT strong_JJ or_CC deep-rooted_JJ objection_NN to_TO it_PRP otherwise_RB and_CC that_IN were_VBD this_DT difficulty_NN removed_VBD he_PRP thought_VBD many_JJ would_MD submit_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
I_PRP suggested_VBD the_DT introduction_NN of_IN animal_JJ vaccination_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN meeting_VBG the_DT difficulty_NN and_CC proposed_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB pro-_VB vided_VBD the_DT municipality_NN would_MD defray_VB the_DT extra_JJ expense_NN ._.

13_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN I_PRP travelled_VBD through_IN Khedá_NNP zilhá_NN ,_, where_WRB I_PRP instituted_VBD strict_JJ inquiries_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT causes_NNS and_CC extent_NN of_IN the_DT small-pox_JJ epidemic_NN ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD dependent_JJ upon_IN hap-hazard_JJ information_NN ;_: there_EX were_VBD no_DT proper_JJ means_NNS of_IN knowing_VBG the_DT places_NNS where_WRB the_DT disease_NN was_VBD prevailing_VBG ._.
Through_IN each_DT táluká_JJ mám-_JJ ledár_NN strict_JJ inquiries_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ,_, and_CC steps_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO send_VB vaccinators_NNS to_TO the_DT infected_JJ localities_NNS ._.

I_PRP was_VBD out_RB again_RB during_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN November_NNP ;_: which_WDT ,_, month_NN was_VBD spent_VBN in_IN travelling_VBG through_IN Chorási_NNP ,_, Ulpád_NNP and_CC Ankleshwar_NNP tálukás_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN inspecting_VBG the_DT several_JJ vaccinators_NNS '_POS work_NN ._.
About_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN November_NNP ,_, I_PRP left_VBD Ankleshwar_NNP for_IN Anand_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN thence_NN viâ_NN Thásrá_NNP arrived_VBD at_IN Bálásinur_NNP on_IN 2nd_CD December_NNP ._.

Chotá_NNP Udaipur_NNP is_VBZ an_DT extensive_JJ state_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ for_IN one_CD man_NN to_TO manage_VB its_PRP$ vaccination_NN ,_, besides_IN the_DT Darbár_NNP takes_VBZ no_DT interest_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN Rájpíplá_NNP has_VBZ two_CD men_NNS ,_, and_CC these_DT happen_VB to_TO be_VB brothers_NNS ,_, who_WP manage_VBP among_IN themselves_PRP to_TO vaccinate_VB a_DT tract_NN of_IN country_NN all_DT along_IN the_DT river_NN Narmadá_NNP about_IN 15_CD miles_NNS in_IN breadth_NN ;_: the_DT most_RBS southern_JJ part_NN ,_, the_DT south-_JJ eastern_JJ and_CC south-western_JJ Ságbárá_NNP and_CC the_DT hilly_NN parts_NNS are_VBP not_RB visited_VBN ._.

Superintendent.39_NNS have_VBP been_VBN attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT two_CD vaccinators_NNS and_CC by_IN the_DT assistant_NN superintendent_NN ,_, who_WP much_RB to_TO his_PRP$ credit_NN and_CC praise_NN ,_, has_VBZ thrown_VBN himself_PRP into_IN the_DT thick_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ doing_VBG good_JJ service_NN in_IN vaccinating_VBG the_DT unprotected_JJ children_NNS ._.

no_DT deaths_NNS ._.

Inoculation_NN ._.
4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

40_CD Tour_NNP ._.

10_CD ._.

6_CD VAC_NNP 42_CD SINDH_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Superintedent.43_NNP having_VBG been_VBN made_VBN to_TO vaccinate_VB not_RB merely_RB as_RB many_JJ as_IN possible_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: under_IN 1_CD year_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: but_CC all_DT above_IN 1_CD year_NN up_RB to_TO 15_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN that_WDT were_VBD not_RB ,_, on_IN inspection_NN ,_, found_VBN to_TO be_VB protected_VBN ._.

2_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN accurate_JJ registration_NN of_IN births_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO say_VB what_WP number_NN of_IN children_NNS should_MD be_VB vaccinated_VBN annually_RB ._.
But_CC taking_VBG the_DT English_JJ birth-_JJ rate_NN as_IN a_DT guide_NN ,_, there_EX should_MD be_VB over_IN 80,000_CD children_NNS born_VBN annually_RB in_IN Sindh_NNP and_CC making_VBG an_DT allowance_NN for_IN deaths_NNS in_IN infancy_NN ,_, there_EX would_MD remain_VB 70_CD ,_, 000_CD to_TO 75,000_CD to_TO be_VB vaccinated_VBN ._.
Vaccination_NN in_IN Khairpur_NNP territory_NN 3_CD ._.
The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT native_JJ state_NN is_VBZ apparently_RB 2,390_CD ;_: but_CC really_RB should_MD be_VB 4,331_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT vaccinator_NN 's_POS returns_NNS for_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN were_VBD false_JJ in_IN toto_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT correctness_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN 's_POS returns_NNS I_PRP am_VBP satisfied_JJ ,_, as_IN I_PRP examined_VBD his_PRP$ work_NN in_IN No-_NNP vember_NNP last_JJ and_CC received_VBD a_DT satisfactory_JJ report_NN from_IN the_DT assistant_NN superintendent_NN after_IN his_PRP$ inspection_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT official_JJ year_NN ._.
Finding_VBG the_DT children_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ territory_NN unprotected_JJ ,_, H._NNP H._NNP Mir_NNP Alimurad_NNP appointed_VBD a_DT second_JJ vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO say_VB they_PRP are_VBP both_DT now_RB working_VBG well_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN too_RB ;_: for_IN assuming_VBG that_DT vaccination_NN was_VBD not_RB practised_VBN much_RB for_IN the_DT pre-_JJ vious_JJ ten_CD years_NNS (_( which_WDT I_PRP believe_VBP is_VBZ not_RB far_RB from_IN the_DT truth_NN )_) there_EX must_MD be_VB still_RB some_DT 30,000_CD unprotected_JJ ,_, if_IN they_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN protected_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ._.
This_DT vaccina-_JJ tor_NN 's_POS returns_NNS were_VBD false_JJ ,_, because_IN his_PRP$ work_NN had_VBD never_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC this_DT ,_, because_IN he_PRP was_VBD not_RB a_DT Government_NNP servant_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP felt_VBD I_PRP had_VBD no_DT right_NN to_TO enter_VB foreign_JJ territory_NN without_IN special_JJ reason_NN and_CC permission_NN ;_: that_IN ,_, intrusion_NN on_IN my_PRP$ part_NN would_MD be_VB equally_RB distasteful_JJ to_TO His_PRP$ Highness_NNP and_CC to_TO Government_NNP ._.
Some_DT such_JJ feeling_NN ,_, I_PRP presume_VBP ,_, prevented_VBD my_PRP$ predecessors_NNS from_IN interfering_VBG ._.
However_RB ,_, when_WRB I_PRP suspected_VBD the_DT returns_NNS were_VBD false_JJ ,_, I_PRP asked_VBD permission_NN through_IN the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP ,_, Colonel_NNP Dunsterville_NNP ,_, to_TO examine_VB the_DT vaccinator_NN 's_POS work_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT facility_NN and_CC assistance_NN were_VBD immediately_RB given_VBN me_PRP ._.
I_PRP now_RB receive_VBP the_DT returns_NNS on_IN the_DT condi-_JJ tion_NN that_IN I_PRP may_MD at_IN any_DT time44_JJ Caste_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Christians_NNS 157_CD ;_: hindús_JJ 15,853_CD ;_: musalmans_NNS 74,292_CD ;_: pársis_NN 73_CD ;_: and_CC other_JJ castes_NNS 9,269_CD ._.

48_CD KUTCH_NNP CICLE_NNP ._.
Superintendent.49_NNP Population_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
Kutch_NNP ,_, though_IN a_DT small_JJ province_NN ,_, has_VBZ 868_CD villages_NNS ,_, mostly_RB ,_, thinly_RB populated_VBD ;_: of_IN which_WDT 520_CD belong_NN to_TO the_DT Darbár_NNP and_CC 348_CD to_TO the_DT Bhá-_NNP yáds_NN ._.

Vaccine_NNP establishment_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, the_DT establishment_JJ con-_NN sisted_VBD of_IN 9_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ number_NN was_VBD sub-_JJ sequently_RB increased_VBN to_TO 11_CD and_CC one_CD assistant_NN superintendent_NN ._.

The_DT acting_NN assistant_NN superintendent_NN acted_VBD as_IN such_JJ in_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN only_RB ,_, but_CC was_VBD acting_VBG as_IN a_DT vaccinator_NN for_IN the_DT previous_JJ time_NN ._.
5_CD vaccinators_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN by_IN Bháyáds_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN under_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT above_JJ divisions_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: 50_CD free_JJ from_IN small-pox_NN ._.
On_IN these_DT days_NNS they_PRP do_VBP not_RB partake_VB of_IN any_DT newly_RB cooked_VBN article_NN ,_, but_CC live_VBP on_IN sweetmeats_NNS or_CC other_JJ articles_NNS prepared_VBN on_IN a_DT previous_JJ day_NN ._.
Notwith-_JJ standing_VBG all_PDT this_DT ,_, if_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS happen_VB to_TO be_VB attacked_VBN with_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, they_PRP again_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT 7th_CD or_CC 9th_CD day_NN of_IN the_DT attack_NN ,_, go_VB to_TO the_DT goddess_NN and_CC perform_VB the_DT above_JJ ceremonies_NNS ._.
They_PRP have_VBP so_RB much_JJ faith_NN in_IN her_PRP$ ,_, that_IN even_RB after_IN their_PRP$ child-_JJ ren_NNS are_VBP vaccinated_VBN ,_, on_IN the_DT 7th_CD day_NN they_PRP proceed_VBP and_CC offer_VBP certain_JJ articles_NNS to_TO her_PRP$ ._.
Such_JJ children_NNS as_IN do_VBP not_RB suffer_VB from_IN small-pox_NN are_VBP considered_VBN under_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT goddess_NN rather_RB than_IN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
With_IN such_PDT a_DT firm_JJ belief_NN in_IN the_DT deity_NN they_PRP treat_VBP vaccination_NN with_IN contempt_NN and_CC consider_VB it_PRP as_IN a_DT curse_NN rather_RB than_IN any_DT good_JJ ._.
With_IN such_JJ ignorance_NN and_CC apathy_NN ,_, the_DT vaccinators_NNS find_VBP it_PRP very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO get_VB on_IN :_: all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN devices_NNS are_VBP practised_VBN to_TO escape_VB vaccination_NN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN a_DT vaccinator_NN is_VBZ going_VBG to_TO a_DT village_NN ,_, many_JJ will_MD either_CC lock_VB up_RP the_DT doors_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, giving_VBG one_CD to_TO understand_VB that_IN nobody_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, or_CC conceal_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS in_IN big_JJ earthern_JJ pots_NNS intended_VBN to_TO hold_VB grain_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS they_PRP run_VBP a_DT way_NN to_TO some_DT of_IN their_PRP$ relations_NNS in_IN a_DT neighbouring_JJ village_NN ._.
This_DT difficulty_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB removed_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT two_CD following_VBG ways_NNS ,_, by_IN allowing_VBG them_PRP time_NN to_TO be-_JJ come_VB more_JJR civilized_JJ and_CC to_TO see_VB the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN or_CC by_IN making_VBG vacci-_JJ nation_NN compulsory_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT complaints_NNS from_IN vaccinators_NNS were_VBD generally_RB of_IN two_CD kinds_NNS :_: one_CD was_VBD about_IN opposition_NN to_TO vaccination_NN from_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ about_IN not_RB getting_VBG their_PRP$ allowances_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT way_NN much_JJ valuable_JJ time_NN was_VBD lost_VBN and_CC in_IN consequence_NN of_IN such_JJ delays_NNS vaccinators_NNS often_RB lost_VBD lymph_JJ which_WDT required_VBD to_TO be_VB re-supplied_JJ ._.
All_PDT this_DT was_VBD attended_VBN with_IN waste_NN of_IN time_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT natural_JJ result_NN the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN was_VBD slow_JJ ._.
Salaries_NNS of_IN vaccinators_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD paid_VBN regularly_RB every_DT month_NN by_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP accord-_NN ing_VBG to_TO fixed_VBN rates_NNS ._.
While_IN they_PRP were_VBD travelling_VBG ,_, they_PRP were_VBD allowed_VBN a_DT pony_NN or_CC camel_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT peon_NN each_DT ._.

0-14-0_JJ per_IN day_NN to_TO cover_VB his_PRP$ and_CC his_PRP$ peon_NN 's_POS batta_NN ,_, and_CC pony_NN feeding_NN ,_, as_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP stopped_VBD there_EX for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ._.

Animal_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
14_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

The_DT people_NNS of_IN this_DT town_NN are_VBP generally_RB against_IN vaccination_NN ._.

3_CD ._.

Mr._NNP Sylvester_NNP ,_, Apothecary_NNP ._.

The_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBD this_DT year_NN is_VBZ 342_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS were_VBD 364_CD or_CC 23_CD in_IN excess_NN of_IN persons_NNS ._.
In_IN comparing_VBG the_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBN with_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN there_RB appears_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN 233_CD in_IN favour_NN of_IN this_DT year_NN ._.
This_DT in-_JJ crement_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ circumstance_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN that_IN there_EX were_VBD 105_CD children_NNS still_RB unprotected_VBN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, although_IN previous_JJ to_TO this_DT vaccination_NN was_VBD carried_VBN on_IN continuously_RB from_IN week_NN to_TO week_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT peons_NNS could_MD not_RB succeed_VB in_IN bringing_VBG more_JJR than_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.
However_RB during_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN April_NNP last_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN munshi_NN and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT municipal_JJ commissioners_NNS ,_, I_PRP managed_VBD to_TO obtain_VB 76_CD children_NNS for_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN ._.
Again_RB during_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP Dr._NNP Williams_NNP visited_VBD this_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC through_IN his_PRP$ influence_NN nearly_RB 700_CD children_NNS were_VBD collected_VBN for_IN inspection_NN ._.

104_CD of_IN them_PRP were_VBD vaccinated_VBN by_IN me_PRP on_IN the_DT spot_NN and_CC others_NNS gradually_RB afterwards_NNS ,_, so_IN that_DT in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP there_EX were_VBD in_IN all_DT 190_CD children_NNS operated_VBN upon_IN ._.

2_CD ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBN there_EX were_VBD 233_CD males_NNS and_CC 108_CD females_NNS and_CC these_DT when_WRB classified_VBD according_VBG to_TO caste_NN were_VBD 198_CD hindús_NN and_CC 143_CD musalmans_NNS :_: 60_CD of_IN them_PRP were_VBD under_IN one_CD year_NN and_CC 281_CD above_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN those_DT primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN was_VBD 272_CD successful_JJ ,_, 72_CD unsuccessful_JJ and_CC doubtful_JJ ,_, and_CC 20_CD unknown_JJ ;_: the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS being_VBG 79.0_CD ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT condition_NN of_IN the_DT lymph_NN was_VBD generally_RB good_JJ ._.
The_DT vesicles_NNS were_VBD round_VBN and_CC pearly_RB with_IN a_DT central_JJ depression_NN ,_, the_DT skin_NN surrounding_VBG it_PRP being_VBG lense_JJ ,_, painful_JJ ,_, and_CC rosy_JJ red_JJ in_IN fair_JJ children_NNS ._.
The_DT cicatrices_NNS were_VBD circular_JJ foveated_VBN ,_, depressed_VBN ,_, and_CC of_IN a_DT darkish_JJ colour_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO record_VB that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN small-pox_NN this_DT year_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP not_RB aware_JJ of_IN inoculation_NN being_VBG practised_VBN here_RB ._.
The_DT chief_JJ obstacle_NN to_TO the_DT spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ the_DT prejudices_NNS amongst_VBP hindús_NN ;_: as_IN they_PRP believe_VBP that_IN their_PRP$ deity_NN is_VBZ displeased_VBN if_IN the_DT children_NNS are_VBP vaccinated_VBN ,_, and_CC many_JJ of_IN them_PRP in_IN consequence_NN prefer_NN to_TO be_VB attacked_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ._.
This_DT idea_NN could_MD only_RB be_VB removed_VBN gradually_RB as_IN education_NN advances_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP more_RBR appreciated_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ town_NN and_CC although_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ have_VBP been_VBN vaccinated_VBN this_DT year_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP assured_VBN there_EX are_VBP still_RB more_RBR unprotected_JJ ;_: and_CC these_DT can_MD only_RB be_VB de-_JJ tected_VBN by_IN frequently_RB going_VBG about_IN the_DT streets_NNS ._.
Very_RB few_JJ voluntarily_RB present_VBP their_PRP$ children_NNS for_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC those_DT vaccinated_VBN are_VBP often_RB hidden_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT lymph_NN being_VBG removed_VBN ._.
Often_RB ,_, children_NNS vaccinated_VBD during_IN a_DT week_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB found_VBN next_JJ week_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN these_DT are_VBP present_JJ fresh_JJ subjects_NNS are_VBP not_RB forthcoming_VBG ._.
Also_RB the_DT mukhtiarkar_NN 's_POS peons_NNS being_VBG frequently_RB changed_VBN ,_, the_DT children_NNS are_VBP brought_VBN irregu-_JJ larly_RB ,_, and_CC thus_RB the_DT lymph_NN becomes_VBZ degenerated_VBN and_CC unfit_JJ for_IN use_NN ._.
To_TO obviate_VB all_PDT these_DT drawbacks_NNS and_CC to_TO ensure_VB the_DT dissemination_NN of_IN vaccination_NN effectively_RB I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB that_IN a_DT special_JJ peon_NN should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN me_PRP ,_, whose_WP$ duty_NN should_MD be_VB solely_RB to_TO look_VB out_RP for_IN children_NNS during_IN the_DT week_NN and_CC have_VBP them_PRP ready_JJ on_IN the_DT vaccination_NN day_NN ._.
9_CD VAC_NNP 66_CD 6_CD ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN sometimes_RB an_DT erythematous_JJ or_CC eczematous_JJ eruption_NN occurring_VBG after_IN vaccination_NN on_IN the_DT arms_NNS of_IN children_NNS ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB observed_VBN any_DT irregularity_NN in_IN its_PRP$ progress_NN or_CC any_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN it_PRP ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN this_DT town_NN only_RB one_CD case_NN of_IN small-pox_NN after_IN successful_JJ vaccination_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ notice_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD a_DT very_RB modified_JJ type_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT last_JJ year_NN when_WRB small-pox_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN this_DT town_NN ,_, only_RB those_DT who_WP were_VBD not_RB vaccinated_VBN were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, while_IN the_DT vaccinated_JJ children_NNS escaped_VBD the_DT disease_NN ._.
MEHAR_NNP DISPENSARY_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Hanmantráo_NNP Bhosle_NNP ,_, 3rd_CD Class_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ._.

325_CD vaccine_NN operations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN performed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 223_CD were_VBD primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN and_CC 102_CD revaccinated_VBN ._.

2_CD ._.

669_CD of_IN 1872-73_CD of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 26th_CD September_NNP 1872_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_PDT a_DT detailed_JJ statement_NN of_IN revaccinations_NNS carried_VBN on_IN among_IN the_DT prisoners_NNS at_IN the_DT Rajkot_NNP jail_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS of_IN which_WDT I_PRP am_VBP satisfied_VBN by_IN personal_JJ observation_NN have_VBP been_VBN most_RBS carefully_RB and_CC diligently_RB noted_VBN by_IN 3rd_CD Class_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP Rámráo_NNP Jánú_NNP attached_VBD to_TO the_DT jail_NN hospital_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN prisoners_NNS vaccinated_VBN was_VBD 70_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP 46_CD were_VBD pro-_JJ tected_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ;_: 8_CD were_VBD protected_VBN by_IN previous_JJ vaccination_NN and_CC 16_CD by_IN revaccination_NN ._.
It_PRP will_MD thus_RB be_VB observed_VBN that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ unprotected_JJ case_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN among_IN all_PDT the_DT prisoners_NNS in_IN the_DT jail_NN ,_, a_DT circumstance_NN that_WDT speaks_VBZ well_RB for_IN the_DT careful_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN per-_JJ formed_VBN in_IN the_DT province_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ;_: although_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD 46_CD prisoners_NNS who_WP had_VBD small-pox_NN previously_RB ,_, the_DT great_JJ majority_NN in_IN their_PRP$ childhood_NN ,_, would_MD tend_VB to_TO prove_VB that_DT inoculation_NN is_VBZ still_RB widely_RB practised_VBN among_IN the_DT peasantry_NN of_IN Káthewád_NNP ._.
Of_IN the_DT 46_CD cases_NNS protected_VBN by_IN small-pox_NN ,_, vaccination_NN was_VBD successful_JJ in_IN 26_CD cases_NNS or_CC in_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN 56.52_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: unsuccessful_JJ in_IN 13_CD cases_NNS or_CC 28.26_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC doubtful_NN in_IN 7_CD cases_NNS or_CC 15.21_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: or_CC in_IN other_JJ words_NNS it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS was_VBD about_IN double_JJ the_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT unsuccessful_JJ ;_: and_CC nearly_RB four_CD times_NNS that_WDT of_IN the_DT doubtful_JJ cases_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT doubtful_JJ cases_NNS in_IN those_DT previously_RB vaccinated_VBN ._.
Finally_RB ,_, as_IN regards_NNS those_DT cases_NNS ,_, 16_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, protected_VBN by_IN revaccination_NN only_RB 2_CD or_CC 12.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD successful_JJ ;_: whereas_JJ 14_CD or_CC 87.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD unsuccessful_JJ ;_: or_CC in_IN other_JJ words_NNS the_DT successful_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD to_TO the_DT unsuccesful_JJ nearly_RB in_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN 1_CD to_TO 7_CD ._.
Revising_VBG the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT foregoing_NN experiments_NNS ,_, if_IN it_PRP be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO draw_VB inferences_NNS from_IN the_DT figures_NNS above_IN stated_VBN and_CC if_IN we_PRP are_VBP to_TO regard_VB suscep-_JJ tibility_NN to_TO vaccination_NN as_IN a_DT measure_NN of_IN liability_NN to_TO the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB conceded_VBN that_IN neither_DT infant_JJ vaccination_NN nor_CC a_DT previous_JJ attack_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ affords_NNS a_DT very_RB efficient_JJ protection_NN against_IN a_DT subsequent_JJ attack_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT best_JJS hope_NN of_IN security_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO lie_VB in_IN revaccination_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, respectfully_RB submit_VBP that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS experimented_VBN on_IN is_VBZ hardly_RB sufficient_JJ to_TO warrant_VB us_PRP in_IN making_VBG deductions_NNS in_IN any_DT other_JJ than_IN a_DT tentative_JJ manner_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN our_PRP$ duty_NN lies_VBZ rather_RB in_IN carefully_RB noting_VBG and_CC stating_VBG facts_NNS than_IN in_IN dogmatizing_VBG on_IN what_WP at_IN best_JJS in_IN the_DT present_JJ state_NN of_IN our_PRP$ knowledge_NN can_MD be_VB but_CC a_DT theory_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP at_IN present_JJ conducting_VBG a_DT further_JJ series_NN of_IN investigations_NNS into_IN this_DT most_RBS important_JJ and_CC highly_RB interesting_JJ subject_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS of_IN which_WDT shall_MD be_VB duly_RB laid_VBN before_IN you_PRP and_CC may_MD it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB hoped_VBN shed_VB some_DT further_JJ light_NN upon_IN what_WP now_RB seems_VBZ obscure_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB enable_JJ us_PRP to_TO correct_VB inferences_NNS we_PRP may_MD be_VB disposed_VBN to_TO draw_VB too_RB hastily_RB from_IN the_DT facts_NNS and_CC figures_NNS now_RB presented_VBN to_TO your_PRP$ notice_NN ._.

No_DT ._.

Letter_NN from_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2085_CD ,_, dated_VBD 9th_CD July_NNP 1874_CD (_( 2_CD )_) primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS should_MD be_VB 99_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ evidently_RB much_JJ room_NN for_IN improvement_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT army_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT returns_NNS still_RB show_VBP a_DT disparity_NN between_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN males_NNS and_CC females_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ greatest_JJS in_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT males_NNS number_NN 55_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT whole_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP generally_RB there_EX are_VBP 52.8_CD males_NNS to_TO 47.2_CD females_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.
The_DT cause_NN is_VBZ propably_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT feelings_NNS and_CC usages_NNS of_IN Native_NNP Society_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO observe_VB from_IN a_DT comparison_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN previous_JJ years_NNS that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT gradual_JJ decline_NN in_IN the_DT excess_NN of_IN males_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT percentages_NNS of_IN caste_NN stand_VBP very_RB much_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB hoped_VBN that_IN by_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT census_NN it_PRP will_MD become_VB practicable_JJ in_IN future_JJ years_NNS to_TO show_VB what_WP proportion_NN they_PRP bear_VBP to_TO each_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN some_DT castes_NNS have_VBP greater_JJR prejudices_NNS than_IN others_NNS against_IN vaccination_NN ._.
The_DT strongest_JJS opposition_NN is_VBZ experienced_VBN from_IN the_DT Lingayats_NNP in_IN Dharwar_NNP ,_, Sholapur_NNP and_CC elsewhere_RB ,_, who_WP object_VBP particularly_RB to_TO lymph_VB being_VBG taken_VBN from_IN the_DT vaccinated_JJ child_NN 's_POS arm_NN ._.
This_DT difficulty_NN might_MD be_VB successfully_RB met_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Turnbull_NNP 's_POS suggestion_NN to_TO the_DT Barsi_NNP Municipality_NNP to_TO introduce_VB animal_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, being_VBG generally_RB adopted_VBN ._.
8_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
5,281-7-5_JJ in_IN the_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, owing_VBG principally_RB to_TO the_DT increase_NN of_IN establishment_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 6_CD pies_NNS in_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ vacci-_JJ nation_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP varies_VBZ considerably_RB in_IN the_DT different_JJ establishments_NNS ,_, being_VBG as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 3_CD )_) ren_NNS who_WP might_MD be_VB primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN ._.
According_VBG to_TO this_DT calculation_NN ,_, nine-_JJ tenths_NNS of_IN the_DT number_NN were_VBD vaccinated_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT result_NN highly_RB credit-_JJ able_JJ to_TO the_DT Department_NNP ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS of_IN each_DT Vacci-_NNP nators_NNS was_VBD 1,652_CD ,_, being_VBG 146_CD more_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD highest_JJS in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, and_CC lowest_JJS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT least_JJS satisfactory_JJ general_JJ results_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP (_( 4_CD )_) 15_CD ._.
Government_NN are_VBP glad_JJ to_TO learn_VB that_IN their_PRP$ orders_NNS with_IN respect_NN to_TO ex-_JJ aminations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN so_RB promptly_RB attended_VBD to_TO ,_, all_PDT the_DT Superintendents_NNS but_CC one_CD ,_, who_WP is_VBZ acting_VBG ,_, having_VBG already_RB passed_VBN in_IN a_DT vernacular_JJ language_NN ._.

Williams_NNP ,_, Butler_NNP ,_, Cody_NNP and_CC Cola_NNP ._.

16_CD ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN by_IN the_DT Army_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commission_NNP that_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Establishment_NNP should_MD be_VB associated_VBN with_IN the_DT Sanitary_JJ Establish-_NNP ment_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT opinion_NN Government_NNP are_VBP disposed_VBN to_TO concur_VB ._.
As_RB long_RB as_IN at_IN present_JJ the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP 's_POS duties_NNS are_VBP mainly_RB limited_VBN to_TO the_DT com-_JJ pilation_NN of_IN vital_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN more_JJR than_IN doubtful_JJ reliability_NN ,_, but_CC insignificant_JJ practical_JJ results_NNS can_MD be_VB looked_VBN for_IN ._.
What_WP is_VBZ wanted_VBN is_VBZ periodical_JJ personal_JJ inspection_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ Towns_NNP ;_: and_CC as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ personal_JJ supervision_NN over_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN the_DT Returns_NNP of_IN vital_JJ statistics_NNS ._.

F._NNP S._NNP CHAPMAN_NNP ,_, Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO Government_NNP ._.

To_TO THE_DT SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, GENERAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP ,_, 14th_CD June_NNP 1875_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernor_NN in_IN Council_NNP and_CC Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP ,_, the_DT Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP and_CC Sindh_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1874-75_RB ._.
2_CD ._.
Briefly_NNP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ progress_NN in_IN all_DT respects_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS are_VBP 80,401_CD more_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ;_: the_DT success_NN is_VBZ higher_JJR ,_, the_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN less_JJR ,_, and_CC the_DT conduct_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT strength_NN of_IN the_DT Department_NNP shows_VBZ 8_CD more_JJR vaccina-_NN tors_NNS than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ;_: in_IN other_JJ respects_NNS there_EX was_VBD no_DT change_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP describes_VBZ the_DT Bombay_NNP System_NNP of_IN vaccination_NN as_IN reorganized_VBN in_IN 1871_CD ,_, and_CC says_VBZ no_DT change_NN either_RB in_IN it_PRP or_CC in_IN the_DT constitution_NN of_IN the_DT Circles_NNP took_VBD place_NN last_JJ year_NN ;_: that_IN as_RB far_RB as_IN he_PRP can_MD see_VB the_DT system_NN is_VBZ perfect_JJ in_IN theory_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ application_NN it_PRP has_VBZ realized_VBN his_PRP$ best_JJS hopes_NNS ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN bears_VBZ out_RP this_DT statement_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN and_CC re-vaccinated_JJ were_VBD 732,624_CD ,_, being_VBG an_DT increase_NN of_IN 80,401_CD ,_, and_CC this_DT increase_NN is_VBZ chiefly_JJ owing_VBG to_TO increased_VBN exertions_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT officers_NNS and_CC vaccinators_NNS of_IN the_DT Department_NNP ._.
The_DT itinerant_JJ vaccinators_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Funds_NNS establish-_JJ ment_NN contribute_NN 59,605_CD of_IN the_DT increase_NN and_CC the_DT Native_NNP States_NNPS '_POS vac-_JJ cinators_NNS 20,325_CD ;_: the_DT rest_NN is_VBZ by_IN Municipal_NNP and_CC by_IN the_DT 2_CD Govern-_JJ ment_NN vaccinators_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT army_NN ,_, which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO want_VB of_IN subjects_NNS ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS were_VBD 671,089_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT re-vac-_JJ cinations_NNS 60,807_CD ;_: the_DT latter_NN were_VBD chiefly_VBN in_IN Sindh_NNP ,_, where_WRB there_EX were_VBD 48,504_CD ._.
No_DT attempt_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN to_TO push_VB re-vaccination_NN anywhere_RB but_CC in_IN Sindh_NNP ;_: because_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ Circles_NNP the_DT vaccinators_NNS have_VBP enough_VBN to_TO do_VB to_TO get_VB through_IN their_PRP$ primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ._.
By_IN and_CC by_IN more_JJR attention_NN will_MD ,_, I_PRP hope_VBP ,_, be_VB given_VBN to_TO re-vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT other_JJ circles_NNS ;_: Sindh_NNP has_VBZ set_VBN the_DT example_NN of_IN what_WP can_MD be_VB done_VBN ._.
B_$ 99_CD (_( 2_CD )_) 7.I_CD am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT disparity_NN in_IN the_DT sexes_NNS is_VBZ again_RB less_JJR ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB probably_RB pretty_RB correct_JJ in_IN general_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB much_RB too_RB high_JJ in_IN Aden_NNP and_CC Sindh_NNP ._.
8.The_CD percentages_NNS of_IN castes_NNS differ_VBP from_IN the_DT census_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO be_VB due_JJ to_TO the_DT method_NN of_IN registering_VBG the_DT low_JJ caste_NN Hindus_NNP ._.
As_IN there_EX is_VBZ ,_, Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP thinks_VBZ ,_, some_DT inclination_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN high_JJ caste_NN Hindu_NNP vaccinators_NNS to_TO avoid_VB contact_NN with_IN the_DT Sudras_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN the_DT vaccination_NN columns_NN for_IN castes_NNS are_VBP very_RB suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG them_PRP being_VBG left_VBN unpro-_JJ tected_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN the_DT Musalmans_NNPS accept_JJ vaccination_NN more_RBR freely_RB than_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ in_IN accord_NN with_IN the_DT general_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT Department_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT city_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP forms_VBZ a_DT Striking_JJ contrast_NN to_TO this_DT almost_RB universal_JJ rule_NN ._.
9.One_CD of_IN the_DT best_JJS signs_NNS of_IN progress_NN in_IN this_DT report_NN is_VBZ the_DT fact_NN of_IN there_EX having_VBG been_VBN 294,841_CD infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ an_DT in-_JJ crease_NN of_IN 55,098_CD over_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
Since_IN the_DT re-organization_NN of_IN 1871_CD these_DT have_VBP increased_VBN by_IN one_CD hundred_CD thousand_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN this_DT report_NN they_PRP stand_VBP at_IN 43.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
on_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT very_RB high_JJ percentage_NN for_IN itinerant_JJ vac-_JJ cinators_NNS to_TO reach_VB ._.
I_PRP note_VBP that_IN the_DT infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS are_VBP again_RB highest_JJS in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP and_CC lowest_JJS in_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP of_IN all_DT British_JJ Circles_NNP ;_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP pleased_JJ to_TO see_VB that_IN the_DT Southern_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, though_IN still_RB the_DT lowest_JJS ,_, is_VBZ 6_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 635,254_CD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN them_PRP the_DT successful_JJ was_VBD 96.4_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 1.6_CD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD highest_JJS in_IN Sindh_NNP ,_, and_CC lowest_JJS in_IN the_DT Presi-_NNP dency_NN Circle_NNP of_IN all_DT British_JJ Circles_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT lowest_JJS is_VBZ only_RB 3.2_CD less_JJR than_IN the_DT highest_JJS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ considered_VBN a_DT very_RB satisfactory_JJ rate_NN of_IN success_NN for_IN an_DT itinerating_JJ establishment_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN ours_NNS is_VBZ ,_, to_TO reach_VB ._.
The_DT re-vaccinations_NNS numbered_VBD 60,807_CD ;_: of_IN these_DT 48,504_CD were_VBD in_IN the_DT Sindh_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT total_JJ 45,618_CD were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, or_CC a_DT percentage_NN of_IN 80_CD .8_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ 15.1_CD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT percentage_NN in_IN the_DT army_NN returns_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD 44.6_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN that_IN the_DT army_NN rate_NN is_VBZ probably_RB ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP considers_NNS ,_, the_DT most_RBS correctly_RB noted_VBN ._.
11_CD ._.
On_IN our_PRP$ population_NN of_IN over_IN twenty-five_JJ millions_NNS ,_, as_IN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT census_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP calculates_VBZ that_IN ,_, with_IN a_DT birth-rate_NN of_IN fully_RB 40_CD per_IN mille_NN ,_, there_EX might_MD be_VB about_IN 850,000_CD persons_NNS primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN per_IN annum_NN ,_, after_IN writing_VBG off_RP 18_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT births_NNS for_IN still-born_JJ ,_, deaths_NNS ,_, those_DT having_VBG small-pox_JJ and_CC those_DT escaping_VBG the_DT vaccinators_NNS ._.
On_IN this_DT calculation_NN ,_, the_DT Department_NNP vaccinated_VBD eight-tenths_NNS of_IN the_DT available_JJ children_NNS last_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT must_MD be_VB viewed_VBN with_IN much_JJ satisfaction_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP fully_RB endorse_VBP the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT (_( 3_CD )_) Superintendent_NNP General_NNP ,_, that_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: nothing_NN but_CC the_DT utmost_JJ devotion_NN to_TO their_PRP$ duty_NN could_MD obtain_VB such_JJ a_DT result_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: by_IN the_DT officers_NNS and_CC vac-_JJ cinators_NNS of_IN the_DT Department_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD 26.7_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT Depart-_NNP ment_NN should_MD aim_VB at_IN 33_CD per_IN mille_NN if_IN the_DT birth-rate_JJ be_VB as_RB high_JJ as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN computed_VBN to_TO be_VB by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Lumsdaine_NNP in_IN the_DT Census_NNP Report_NNP ._.
The_DT rate_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS per_IN mille_NN of_IN population_NN ranges_NNS from_IN 39.1_CD in_IN Sindh_NNP to_TO 19.3_CD in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT birth-rate_NN of_IN a_DT city_NN like_IN Bombay_NNP can_MD not_RB be_VB anything_NN like_IN 40_CD per_IN mille_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ probably_RB not_RB over_IN 25_CD ,_, as_IN stated_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ;_: so_CC that_IN 19.3_CD in_IN Bombay_NNP city_NN is_VBZ positively_RB higher_JJR than_IN 21.7_CD in_IN the_DT Southern_JJ Circle_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_JJ returns_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN there_EX were_VBD successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN in_IN British_JJ territory_NN 26.9_CD per_IN mille_NN and_CC in_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS 22.3_CD ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT lymph_NN degenerated_VBD for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN in_IN three_CD Circles_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, Eastern_NNP Gujarath_NNP ,_, Western_NNP Gujarath_NNP ,_, and_CC Sindh_NNP ,_, but_CC was_VBD promptly_RB renewed_VBN ._.
The_DT lymph_NN which_WDT was_VBD received_VBN from_IN England_NNP succeeded_VBD in_IN five_CD Circles_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD unsuccessful_JJ in_IN two_CD ;_: sufficient_NN was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, obtained_VBN to_TO multiply_VB to_TO any_DT extent_NN required_VBN ._.
An-_NNP imal_JJ vaccination_NN was_VBD practised_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Poona_NNP and_CC Barsi_NNP ._.
The_DT cow-lymph_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP was_VBD abundant_JJ and_CC good_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT success_NN resulting_VBG from_IN its_PRP$ use_NN was_VBD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ of_IN special_JJ use_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, where_WRB of_IN all_DT places_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN next_IN to_TO impossible_JJ to_TO induce_VB parents_NNS to_TO bring_VB their_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO give_VB lymph_NN for_IN further_JJ vaccinations_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT expenditure_NN from_IN all_DT sources_NNS was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
2,20,663_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT Government_NNP contributed_VBD about_IN half_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
4,580_CD over_IN 1873-74_JJ ._.
Government_NNP contributed_VBD of_IN this_DT increase_NN about_IN one-half_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ half_NN was_VBD provided_VBN by_IN Native_NNP States_NNPS ,_, local_JJ and_CC municipal_JJ funds_NNS ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN was_VBD 5_CD annas_NNS and_CC 4_CD pies_NNS ,_, or_CC 10_CD pies_NNS less_RBR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
A_DT memorandum_NN is_VBZ now_RB before_RB Government_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP shows_VBZ how_WRB a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN expenditure_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB debited_VBN to_TO general_JJ sanitation_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT Superintendents_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ Assistants_NNS inspected_VBN 47_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT persons_NNS operated_VBN on_IN ,_, without_IN discovering_VBG any_DT falsi-_JJ fications_NNS in_IN the_DT registers_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN British_JJ territory_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP regret_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_DT Dr._NNP Blomfield_NNP ,_, in_IN Kathewad_NNP ,_, discover-_JJ ed_NN ten_JJ instances_NNS of_IN this_DT very_RB serious_JJ offence_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Raby_NNP reports_VBZ another_DT in_IN the_DT Kolhapur_NNP State_NNP ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT practice_NN is_VBZ now_RB very_RB limited_JJ ;_: it_PRP can_MD not_RB escape_VB the_DT searching_NN tests_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT registers_NNS are_VBP subjected_VBN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) 15.It_CD is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_DT vaccination_NN is_VBZ still_RB so_RB back-_JJ ward_NN in_IN Kutch_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB costly_JJ ._.

Cola_NNP and_CC Blomfield_NNP ._.

17.Dr_CD ._.
Williams_NNP brought_VBD to_TO notice_VB a_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: false_JJ vaccinator._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: A_NNP man_NN went_VBD about_IN in_IN the_DT Thar_NNP and_CC Parkar_NNP pretending_VBG to_TO vaccinate_VB by_IN making_VBG punctures_NNS ,_, but_CC had_VBD no_DT lymph_NN ;_: the_DT people_NNS paid_VBD him_PRP for_IN the_DT operation_NN ._.

The_DT man_NN was_VBD prosecuted_VBN and_CC convicted_VBN ._.
18.In_CD regard_NN to_TO vaccino-syphilis_NN ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP says_VBZ not_RB a_DT single_JJ instance_NN has_VBZ yet_RB come_VBN to_TO light_NN of_IN syphilis_NN having_VBG been_VBN communicated_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN to_TO any_DT person_NN in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, notwithstanding_VBG every_DT effort_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT De-_NNP partment_NN to_TO discover_VB any_DT such_JJ case_NN ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ experience_NN in_IN this_DT matter_NN extends_VBZ to_TO over_VB a_DT million_CD and_CC a_DT quarter_NN of_IN observations_NNS ._.
