21.As_CD regards_NNS small-pox_JJ ,_, the_DT year_NN 1874-5_NN was_VBD a_DT non-epidemic_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT recorded_JJ deaths_NNS stand_VBP at_IN 3,903_CD only_RB ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT it_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN that_IN some_DT were_VBD incorrectly_RB returned_VBN as_IN having_VBG died_VBN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, when_WRB in_IN reality_NN many_JJ died_VBD of_IN measles_NNS and_CC other_JJ diseases_NNS ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

131_CD ._.
When_WRB I_PRP returned_VBD to_TO India_NNP from_IN furlough_NN in_IN 1873_CD I_PRP found_VBD on_IN the_DT records_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ office_NN Her_PRP$ Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP 's_POS despatch_NN No_NNP ._.
4_CD (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) dated_VBD India_NNP Office_NNP ,_, London_NNP ,_, 26th_CD March_NNP 1872_CD ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT Army_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commission_NNP recommended_VBD that_IN the_DT vaccination_NN department_NN should_MD be_VB utilized_VBN in_IN the_DT general_JJ sanitation_NN of_IN this_DT presidency_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Argyll_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT despatch_NN ,_, said_VBD in_IN reference_NN to_TO this_DT ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: I_PRP commend_VBP to_TO the_DT particular_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: attention_NN of_IN your_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP the_DT views_NNS expressed_VBN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: part_NN of_IN the_DT paper_NN received_VBN from_IN the_DT Commission._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: In_IN my_PRP$ previous_JJ report_NN I_PRP drew_VBD attention_NN to_TO the_DT despatch_NN ,_, and_CC stated_VBD my_PRP$ conviction_NN that_IN the_DT vaccination_NN department_NN might_MD aid_VB in_IN the_DT general_JJ sanita-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN without_IN injuring_VBG the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN depart-_JJ ment_NN ,_, and_CC since_IN then_RB Government_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN pleased_VBN to_TO issue_VB the_DT following_JJ orders_NNS :56_VBP &_CC quot_VBP ;_: 3_CD ._.
They_PRP will_MD advise_VB generally_RB on_IN local_JJ sanitary_JJ matters_NNS ,_, more_RBR especially_RB &_CC quot_NNS ;_: with_IN regard_NN to_TO surface_VB conservancy_NN ,_, ordinary_JJ surface_NN and_CC subsoil_NN drainage_NN ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT conservation_NN of_IN tanks_NNS ,_, wells_NNS and_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN water_NN supply_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 4_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS Epidemics_NNS ,_, they_PRP will_MD advise_VB general_JJ precautionary_JJ mea-_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: sures_NNS ,_, and_CC try_VB to_TO find_VB out_RP their_PRP$ distinguishing_NN characteristics_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ causes_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ course_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 5_CD ._.
In_IN all_PDT that_DT relates_VBZ to_TO their_PRP$ duty_NN as_IN Health_NNP Officers_NNP they_PRP will_MD commu-_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: nicate_JJ direct_JJ with_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC with_IN local_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 6_CD ._.
Assistant_JJ Superintendents_NNS and_CC Vaccinators_NNS will_MD also_RB inspect_VB the_DT &_CC quot_NN ;_: registers_NNS and_CC report_NN to_TO their_PRP$ Departmental_JJ Superiors_NNPS as_IN to_TO how_WRB they_PRP are_VBP &_CC quot_VBP ;_: kept_NNS ._.
Assistant_JJ Superintendents_NNS will_MD advise_VB Patels_NNP and_CC others_NNS as_IN to_TO ordi-_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: nary_JJ village_NN cleanliness_NN ,_, will_MD look_VB at_IN wells_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC report_NN generally_RB &_CC quot_RB ;_: what_WP attention_NN is_VBZ paid_VBN to_TO simple_JJ matters_NNS of_IN conservancy_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 7_CD ._.
Neither_CC the_DT Superintendents_NNS nor_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS are_VBP to_TO do_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: more_JJR than_IN advise_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP will_MD confine_VB their_PRP$ advise_NN (_( the_DT latter_NN especially_RB )_) &_CC quot_$ ;_: to_TO such_JJ simple_JJ matters_NNS as_IN are_VBP within_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, or_CC which_WDT &_CC quot_NN ;_: involves_VBZ no_DT outlay_NN beyond_IN the_DT means_NNS of_IN those_DT advised_VBN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 8_CD ._.
The_DT Birth_NNP and_CC Death_NNP registers_NNS will_MD be_VB kept_VBN by_IN the_DT present_JJ agency_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: (_( Kulkarnis_NNP and_CC others_NNS )_) ,_, but_CC all_DT entries_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN Register_NNP Books_NNP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: which_WDT will_MD be_VB prepared_VBN under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT change_NN is_VBZ &_CC quot_NN ;_: to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN them_PRP without_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 9_CD ._.
As_IN suggested_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: should_MD ,_, in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: draw_VB up_RP such_JJ general_JJ rules_NNS or_CC directions_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT matters_NNS above_IN re-_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: ferred_VBN to_TO ,_, as_IN will_MD enable_VB the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP to_TO familiarize_VB &_CC quot_VB ;_: themselves_PRP with_IN the_DT kind_NN of_IN work_NN expected_VBN of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC also_RB afford_VB them_PRP &_CC quot_NN ;_: the_DT means_NNS of_IN instructing_VBG their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, the_DT more_RBR intelligent_NN of_IN whom_WP &_CC quot_VBP ;_: may_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO become_VB useful_JJ assistants_NNS in_IN Sanitary_NNP work._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: I_PRP feel_VBP certain_JJ this_DT step_NN will_MD in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN obtain_VB for_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ de-_JJ partment_NN more_RBR correct_JJ figures_NNS regarding_VBG life_NN and_CC death_NN ;_: but_CC until_IN the_DT vital_JJ statistics_NNS are_VBP in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT health_NN officers_VBZ the_DT progress_NN in_IN respect_NN to_TO correctness_VB will_MD be_VB limited_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP ,_, in_IN a_DT memorandum_NN now_RB before_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, expressed_VBN my_PRP$ views_NNS on_IN the_DT whole_JJ subject_NN of_IN the_DT union_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ and_CC vaccination_NN departments_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB under_IN consideration_NN I_PRP can_MD only_RB just_RB allude_VB to_TO the_DT matter_NN here_RB ._.

Letter_NN from_IN the_DT Surgeon_NNP General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2085_CD ,_, dated_VBD 9th_CD July_NNP 1875_CD (_( 2_CD )_) in_IN Cutch_NNP and_CC 919_CD in_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO 2,790_CD in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
So_RB that_IN ,_, taking_VBG the_DT work-_JJ ing_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN at_IN 300_CD ,_, each_DT Vaccinator_NNP in_IN Sind_NNP operated_VBD on_IN 9_CD persons_NNS daily_RB ,_, while_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP the_DT number_NN was_VBD only_RB 3_CD ,_, although_IN the_DT population_NN in_IN Sind_NNP is_VBZ widely_RB scattered_VBN and_CC that_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ just_RB the_DT reverse_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
Government_NNP concur_NN with_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP in_IN consider-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT punishment_NN of_IN fine_NN to_TO a_DT Vaccinator_NNP who_WP falsifies_VBZ his_PRP$ returns_NNS as_IN wholly_RB inadequate_JJ ._.
Such_JJ an_DT offence_NN is_VBZ invariably_RB to_TO be_VB punished_VBN by_IN dismissal_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
Government_NN are_VBP not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO pay_VB for_IN a_DT Vaccinator_NNP in_IN the_DT Dangs_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ clearly_RB desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT people_NNS there_EX should_MD be_VB protected_VBN ._.
The_DT question_NN should_MD be_VB referred_VBN for_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Political_NNP Agent_NNP in_IN Khandesh_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT addition_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ work_NN to_TO the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP is_VBZ a_DT measure_NN which_WDT will_MD enable_VB that_IN efficient_NN but_CC expensive_JJ body_NN to_TO show_VB greater_JJR returns_NNS of_IN work_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD ,_, the_DT Government_NNP are_VBP confident_JJ ,_, be_VB attended_VBN with_IN excellent_JJ results_NNS to_TO the_DT country_NN generally_RB ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP recently_RB drawn_VBN attention_NN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN for_IN economy_NN in_IN printing_VBG annual_JJ reports_NNS ._.
Government_NNP recognize_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT length_NN of_IN that_DT under_IN review_NN ,_, the_DT careful_JJ attention_NN to_TO minute_VB details_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, coupled_VBN with_IN the_DT zeal_NN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP has_VBZ infused_VBN into_IN his_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, has_VBZ rendered_VBN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT Department_NNP so_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
But_CC they_PRP trust_VBP that_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP General_NNP will_MD be_VB able_JJ next_JJ year_NN to_TO condense_VB a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN his_PRP$ information_NN ,_, especially_RB that_IN towards_VBZ the_DT conclusion_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN ._.

FROM_IN THE_NNP SURGEON-GENERAL_NNP ,_, INDIAN_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, GENERAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP ,_, 4th_CD July_NNP 1876_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO forward_VB the_DT annual_JJ report_NN on_IN vaccination_NN for_IN 1875-76_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
This_DT report_NN shows_VBZ that_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN considerably_RB extended_VBN at_IN a_DT comparatively_RB less_RBR cost_NN than_IN in_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT pre-_JJ ceding_NN 7_CD years_NNS ._.
No_DT changes_NNS of_IN any_DT importance_NN have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT system_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN of_IN placing_VBG the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN civil_JJ populations_NNS in_IN cantonments_NNS under_IN this_DT department_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 4_CD more_JJR vaccinators_NNS employed_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN and_CC re-vaccinated_VBN was_VBD 808,353_CD ,_, or_CC 75,729_CD of_IN an_DT increase_NN over_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 18,822_CD were_VBD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS and_CC 56,907_CD re-vaccinations_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB gratifying_VBG to_TO observe_VB that_IN there_EX were_VBD 22,573_CD infantile_JJ vaccinations_NNS more_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN :_: so_RB ,_, the_DT percentage_NN being_VBG 46_CD on_IN the_DT total_NN ,_, 3_CD higher_JJR than_IN in_IN 1874-75_JJ ._.
The_DT whole_JJ in-_JJ crease_NN in_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN among_IN infants_NNS ,_, the_DT best_JJS possible_JJ sign_NN of_IN satisfactory_JJ progress_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB offered_VBN ._.
The_DT great_JJ increase_NN in_IN re-vaccinations_NNS is_VBZ chiefly_JJ noticed_VBN in_IN Sind_NNP and_CC the_DT city_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT latter_NN it_PRP is_VBZ wholly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT recent_JJ severe_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
Considering_VBG that_DT in_IN the_DT previous_JJ report_NN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP estimated_VBD that_IN eight-tenths_NNS of_IN the_DT available_JJ children_NNS were_VBD primarily_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ obvious_JJ that_IN future_JJ progress_NN must_MD be_VB slow_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT disparity_NN between_IN the_DT sexes_NNS is_VBZ again_RB less_RBR ,_, but_CC Aden_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP city_NN still_RB show_VBP a_DT large_JJ excess_NN of_IN males_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT for-_JJ mer_NN it_PRP is_VBZ satisfactorily_RB accounted_VBN for_IN in_IN this_DT report_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Hay_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT same_JJ reason_NN may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO hold_VB good_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, the_DT objection_NN of_IN parents_NNS to_TO bring_VB their_PRP$ grown-up_JJ girls_NNS into_IN public_JJ ._.
B_$ 106_CD (_( 2_CD )_) As_IN regards_NNS caste_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ increase_NN of_IN Hindus_NNP and_CC a_DT decrease_NN of_IN Musalmans_NNPS ,_, chiefly_NN in_IN Sind_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT subjects_NNS for_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN fewer_JJR ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN Parsis_NNP is_VBZ fully_RB double_JJ that_IN mentioned_VBD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ report_NN ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN in_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS was_VBD 97_CD ,_, being_VBG higher_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ;_: in_IN re-vaccinations_NNS it_PRP was_VBD 85.2_CD ,_, also_RB higher_JJR ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ doubt_NN of_IN this_DT latter_JJ percentage_NN being_VBG correct_JJ ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN determining_VBG what_WP is_VBZ a_DT success_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, be_VB well_RB were_VBD re-vaccinations_NNS tabulated_VBN under_IN the_DT heading_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: perfect_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC &_CC quot_NN ;_: imperfect_JJ success_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: ,_, instead_RB of_IN &_CC quot_NN ;_: successful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: and_CC &_CC quot_NN ;_: unsuccessful_JJ &_CC quot_NN ;_: ;_: this_DT ,_, although_IN open_JJ to_TO the_DT objection_NN that_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS are_VBP not_RB scientifically_RB trained_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS ,_, yet_RB would_MD ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN ,_, be_VB an_DT improvement_NN ,_, and_CC give_VB more_JJR precise_JJ information_NN on_IN this_DT point_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN on_IN in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 25,167,234_CD ._.
In_IN British_NNP territory_NN 27.1_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN population_NN were_VBD successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN primarily_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN native_JJ states_NNS 24.4_CD ._.
These_DT figures_NNS show_VBP an_DT increase_NN ,_, respectively_RB ,_, of_IN 0.2_CD and_CC 2.1_CD ,_, and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_JJ Presidency_NNP ,_, 26.2_CD of_IN primary_JJ successful_JJ vaccinations_NNS to_TO popula-_JJ tion_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT lymph_NN ,_, generally_RB ,_, was_VBD good_JJ ,_, but_CC in_IN 4_CD circles_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB renewed_VBN ._.
The_DT usual_JJ annual_JJ supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN from_IN England_NNP was_VBD not_RB received_VBN ;_: and_CC I_PRP concur_VBP with_IN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP that_IN the_DT Secre-_NNP tary_NN of_IN State_NNP should_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO send_VB out_RP 2_CD supplies_NNS ,_, of_IN 45_CD tubes_NNS each_DT ,_, in_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP ._.
Cow-lymph_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN kept_VBN up_RP in_IN Bombay_NNP throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD found_VBN of_IN the_DT utmost_JJ value_NN during_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) 395,657_CD vaccinated_JJ persons_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ almost_RB 50_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_DT 12_CD vaccinators_NNS were_VBD dismissed_VBN for_IN falsification_NN (_( 4_CD )_) will_MD be_VB pleased_VBN to_TO notice_VB the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP Dorabji_NNP Hormasji_NNP ,_, medi-_JJ cal_JJ officer_NN to_TO H._NNP H._NNP the_DT Rao_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ,_, to_TO improve_VB the_DT state_NN of_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN in_IN his_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ gratifying_VBG to_TO notice_VB the_DT remark_NN by_IN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP in_IN para_NN ._.
111_CD ,_, that_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN 's_POS work_NN is_VBZ the_DT best_JJS he_PRP has_VBZ ever_RB re-_JJ corded_NNS ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB ably_RB superintended_VBN by_IN this_DT officer_NN for_IN above_IN 8_CD years_NNS ,_, as_IN evidenced_VBN by_IN the_DT yearly_JJ pro-_JJ gress_NN it_PRP has_VBZ made_VBN ,_, that_IN I_PRP can_MD not_RB but_CC regret_VBZ the_DT possibility_NN of_IN his_PRP$ appointment_NN being_VBG abolished_VBN ;_: and_CC I_PRP feel_VBP sure_JJ Government_NNP will_MD gladly_RB recognize_VB the_DT great_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN this_DT officer_NN in_IN this_DT special_JJ department_NN of_IN sanitation_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, Sir_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ Servant_NNP ,_, WM_NNP ._.
THOM_NNP ,_, F.R.C.S._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP ._.
REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP THROUGHOUT_NNP THE_NNP BOMBAY_NNP PRESIDENCY_NNP AND_NNP SIND_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1875-76_CD ._.
Divisions_NNS of_IN Report_NNP ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT eighth_JJ annual_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP Ge-_NNP neral_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, it_PRP will_MD show_VB :_: 1st_CD ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN as_IN a_DT whole_NN ;_: 2nd_CD ,_, the_DT progress_NN vaccination_NN has_VBZ made_VBN in_IN each_DT district_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, 3rd_CD ,_, the_DT tables_NNS of_IN figures_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS ,_, cost_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP given_VBN in_IN the_DT forms_NNS ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
No_DT change_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT circles_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ;_: but_CC a_DT proposal_NN is_VBZ now_RB before_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP which_WDT ,_, if_IN ap-_JJ proved_NN ,_, will_MD cause_VB the_DT circles_NNS to_TO be_VB arranged_VBN after_IN the_DT manner_NN of_IN the_DT registration_NN divisions_NNS ._.
The_DT circles_NNS will_MD then_RB stand_VB thus_RB :2_NNP Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Bill_NNP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT suggestions_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.
This_DT Government_NNP in_IN their_PRP$ Resolution_NN No_DT ._.
3550_CD ,_, dated_VBD 26th_CD November_NNP last_JJ ,_, under_IN instructions_NNS from_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, ordered_VBD that_IN the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN all_DT cantonments_NNS situated_VBN within_IN vaccination_NN circles_NNS shall_MD be_VB under_IN the_DT circle_NN superintendents_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN reference_NN to_TO this_DT ,_, I_PRP recently_RB submitted_VBD to_TO the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP a_DT detail_NN of_IN the_DT changes_NNS and_CC arrangements_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT orders_NNS ._.

Bombay_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, 17th_CD July_NNP 1876_CD ._.
Letter_NN from_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2631_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD July_NNP 1876_CD (_( 2_CD )_) dency_NN ,_, from_IN 8_CD annas_NNS 9_CD pies_NNS to_TO 4_CD annas_NNS 4_CD pies_NNS ,_, and_CC Cutch_NNP from_IN 14_CD annas_NNS 8_CD pies_NNS to_TO 10_CD annas_NNS 11_CD pies_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT last-named_JJ there_EX is_VBZ still_RB much_JJ room_NN for_IN improvement_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN each_DT operator_NN varies_VBZ from_IN 436_CD in_IN Cutch_NNP to_TO 3,060_CD in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
These_DT show_VBP a_DT large_JJ increase_NN on_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP rises_VBZ to_TO 2,228_CD from_IN 1,176_CD ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT various_JJ Superintendents_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN thoroughly_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, Drs_NNP ._.
Williams_NNP ,_, Cody_NNP ,_, Raby_NNP ,_, and_CC Blomfield_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Ananta_NNP Chandroba_NNP ,_, being_VBG specially_RB brought_VBN to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP 's_POS opinion_NN that_IN personal_JJ examination_NN of_IN some_DT 3,000_CD children_NNS by_IN each_DT Superintendent_NN in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ division_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS is_VBZ a_DT sufficient_JJ test_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN ,_, is_VBZ concurred_VBN in_IN ._.
7_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN no_DT less_JJR than_IN 12_CD vaccinators_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB dismissed_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, judging_VBG from_IN the_DT heavy_JJ fines_NNS inflicted_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Blomfield_NNP on_IN others_NNS ,_, more_JJR ought_MD to_TO have_VB shared_VBN this_DT fate_NN ._.
The_DT expediency_NN of_IN fining_VBG repeatedly_RB or_CC heavily_RB such_JJ men_NNS as_IN vaccinators_NNS is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO question_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Ratnágiri_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN inocula-_JJ tion_NN in_IN that_DT district_NN ,_, as_IN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN paragraph_NN 42_CD ,_, may_MD be_VB awaited_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Collectors_NNS of_IN Surat_NNP and_CC Kaira_NNP called_VBD to_TO Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ 48th_CD paragraph_NN on_IN the_DT extreme_JJ inaccuracy_NN of_IN the_DT death_NN re-_NN gisters_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ districts_NNS ._.
Such_JJ cases_NNS as_IN these_DT show_VBP the_DT advantage_NN of_IN utilising_VBG the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP in_IN sanitary_JJ inspections_NNS ._.
9_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO their_PRP$ proper_JJ duties_NNS as_IN Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN have_VBP inspected_VBN dispensaries_NNS ,_, examined_VBD birth_NN and_CC death_NN registers_NNS ,_, and_CC advised_VBD on_IN the_DT removal_NN or_CC abatement_NN of_IN nuisances_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, Government_NNP fully_RB recognise_VB the_DT excellent_JJ services_NNS of_IN Dr._NNP Pinkerton_NNP as_IN head_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN over_IN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ so_RB long_RB and_CC successfully_RB presided_VBN ._.
11_CD ._.
